title: Remove 'Learn More' sections with embedded videos from all pages

requirements.text: Remove all 'Learn More' sections that contain VideoEmbed components from the Overview page

quotes: take out the learn more part with the music video of the website

acceptanceCriteria: No 'Learn More' heading or section containing VideoEmbed component exists on the Overview page
Page layout remains clean and properly structured after removal

constraints: Do not modify the VideoEmbed component itself in frontend/src/components/shared/VideoEmbed.tsx
Preserve all other page content including diagrams, fact boxes, tables, and cards
Maintain existing page structure and styling after removal
nonGoals: Removing any non-video content from the pages
Changing the layout or styling of remaining page elements
